# init(_:pickerOptionContent:confirmation:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ StoreKit ](/documentation/storekit)

- [ init(_:pickerOptionContent:confirmation:) ](/documentation/storekit/subscriptionstorepicker/init(_:pickeroptioncontent:confirmation:))

-  init(_:pickerOptionContent:confirmation:) 

Initializer# init(_:pickerOptionContent:confirmation:)

StoreKitSwiftUIiOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+macOS 15.0+visionOS 2.0+watchOS 11.0+

```
@MainActor @preconcurrency
init(
    _ configuration: SubscriptionStoreControlStyleConfiguration,
    @ViewBuilder pickerOptionContent: @escaping (SubscriptionStoreControlStyleConfiguration.PickerOption) -> PickerContent,
    @ViewBuilder confirmation: @escaping (SubscriptionStoreControlStyleConfiguration.Option) -> ConfirmationContent
)
```

Available when `PickerContent` conforms to `View` and `ConfirmationContent` conforms to `View`.## [See Also](/documentation/storekit/subscriptionstorepicker/init(_:pickeroptioncontent:confirmation:)#see-also)

### [Creating a subscription store picker](/documentation/storekit/subscriptionstorepicker/init(_:pickeroptioncontent:confirmation:)#Creating-a-subscription-store-picker)
